mi:PackageInformation.name: Composite.Community.OpenID
mi:PackageInformation.author: Composite A/S
mi:PackageInformation.Description: Requires visitors sign in with an OpenID (including that provided by Google, Yahoo etc) to view protected pages or content on pages. Redirects unauthorized visitors to the sign-in page.
mi:PackageInformation.TechnicalDetails: Requires visitors sign in with an OpenID (including that provided by Google, Yahoo etc) to view protected pages or content on pages. Redirects unauthorized visitors to the sign-in page.
